p: Drugs that can increase ACE2 activity include losartan (NCT04312009, NCT04311177, NCT04340557, and NCT04343001; clinicaltrials.gov), diminazene diaceturate, resorcinol naphthalein, and xantenone (Li et al., 2020). Also, AT 1 receptor antagonists have been considered as anti‐COVID‐19 therapeutics (Gurwitz, 2020). Furthermore, recombinant ACE2 has been proposed in both pneumonia (Khan et al., 2017) and COVID‐19 (Monteil et al., 2020).
